## Meeting Details

- **Date/Time:** Month Date, Year @ 4:00pm UTC / 12:00pm ET

- **Recording:** TBA
- **Moderator:** TBA
- **Secretary:** TBA
- **Publisher:** TBA

## Standup Updates

- What is everyone working on right now?
- Any blockers?
- What will happen over the next two weeks?
